dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-tox
dependencies.description: tox is a generic virtualenv management and test command line tool.

dependencies.name: py-flake8
dependencies.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.

dependencies.name: py-pep8-naming
dependencies.description: Check PEP-8 naming conventions, plugin for flake8.

dependencies.name: py-twine
dependencies.description: Twine is a utility for publishing Python packages on PyPI.

dependent_to.name: lbann
dependent_to.description:
LBANN: Livermore Big Artificial Neural Network Toolkit. A distributed
memory, HPC-optimized, model and data parallel training toolkit for deep
neural networks.

dependent_to.name: py-xgboost
dependent_to.description:
XGBoost is an optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed
to be highly efficient, flexible and portable.

dependent_to.name: mxnet
dependent_to.description:
MXNet is a deep learning framework designed for both efficiency and
flexibility.
